      • addProductToOrder

        @PutMapping("/addproduct/{ordid}")
public void addProductToOrder​(int productId,
                              int quantity,
                              @PathVariable("ordid")
                              int ordid)
                       throws InsufficientStockException
        Add a product to a current order.
        Parameters:
        pq - Map containing the identification of a product and the quantity to add.
        ordid - The id of a current Order which the product will be added.
        Throws:
        InsufficientStockException

public void removeProductToOrder​(int productId,

                          throws InsufficientStockException,
                                 ProductNotContainedInOrderException

        ordid - The id of a current Order which the product will be remove.

        ProductNotContainedInOrderException
